content: FMCPAY is one of the most trusted platforms for trading cryptocurrencies and digital securities in the world. FMCPAY is a cryptocurrency exchange based in the United States. comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Very thoughtful of you for you to have put up the advert in here for everyone to see and make use of.However, I have concerns, often times people pose to be agents representing exchangers for listing purposes and all that, how do we know which is actually representing yours and if you truly have agents that go through telegram communities with adverts of being lisiting officers to exchangers and your exchange.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Trying to read your terms of service, yours has got to be the shortest terms of service I have every read. But seriously, who created your ToS? They did a very poor job. No proper text justification at all.Secondly, what is your exchange's relationship with Coinbase pro?Is FMCPay.us also one of your domains?
